cher from clueless is my idea of perfection.

content.text: Happy New Year! How did you spend your birthday?
Happy New Year to you too! I spent it with my family and friends. We had a great time eating, drinking, and playing games.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I spent my birthday with my family as well. We went out to dinner and then played board games at home.
That sounds like a good time too. I love spending time with my family.
Me too. They are my favorite people.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to concerts, play guitar, and spend time with my friends.
I love going to concerts too! I also like to go hiking and biking.
I have never been hiking before. I would love to try it sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
I know, I've heard great things about it.
Well, if you ever want to go hiking, I'd be happy to show you around.
Awesome! We can make it a double date with our spouses.
That sounds like a great idea
